table_caption: Univariate and multivariate predictors of post-stroke-cognitive-impairment (PSCI) within 24 months from stroke.
table_foot: Univariate and multivariate predictors of post-stroke-cognitive-impairment (PSCI) within 24 months from stroke. PSCI was defined as a diagnosis of either MCI or dementia throughout the 24 months follow-up. CI, confidence interval; ICC, Intra cranial calcium; MRI, Magnetic Resonance Imaging. Significant results are shown in bold (p < 0.05).
